name: ansible v3.1.2
body:
- FIX kria out-of-bounds access on pattern + prob page @csboling 
- FIX kria metapattern out of bounds and levels ii @csboling 
- NEW 256 grid support for kria and earthsea @Dewb 
- FIX add a bootup delay when in leader mode @scanner-darkly 
- FIX usb presets: fix reading of split numbers @csboling

name: ansible v3.1.1
body:
brought to you by @csboling @scanner-darkly @tehn 
 
## v3.1.1

- **NEW**: latest grid support


## v3.1.0
- **FIX**: tuning customization behavior in midi modes
- **FIX**: send original rather than customized pitch table values to ii followers
- **FIX**: bugs preventing saving / loading some presets to USB
- **FIX**: disable i2c during preset writes to prevent possible loss of data
- **FIX**: improve delay when connecting grid and arc
- **FIX**: reset JF velocity when exiting leader mode
- **NEW**: freeze one pattern for editing while meta sequence continues to run
- **NEW**: optionally reset the entire meta pattern on a reset trigger
- **NEW**: optionally always tie notes when duration is maxed
- **NEW**: Disting EX as ii follower
- **NEW**: W/syn as ii follower
- **NEW**: crow as ii follower
- **NEW**: supports new `ES.CV` teletype op

name: ansible 3.0
body:
3.0.0 is now here, thanks to tireless contributions by @csboling 

- **NEW**: i2c leader mode for controlling Just Friends, TELEXo, or ER-301 from ansible
- **NEW**: kria: playhead shows on probability page
- **FIX**: avoid some types of i2c crashes
- **FIX**: kria: glitches when stopping and restarting external clock
- **NEW**: compensate-shift scales by holding scale key when changing scale notes
- **NEW**: supports new kria teletype ops: `KR.CUE`, `KR.DIR`, `KR.DUR`

See the [docs](https://monome.org/docs/modular/ansible).

See the [update procedure](http://monome.org/docs/modular/update).

CAUTION: All presets will be erased. If you'd like to back up your presets, see [this post](https://llllllll.co/t/ansible-kria-feature-requests/4846/184)

name: ansible 2.0.0
body:
2.0.0 is a massive update to ansible by @scanner-darkly and @csboling 

- earthsea application (for grids).
- new preset system now imports/exports as JSON from USB disk.
- new kria feature: rev/tri/drunk play directions

See the [new docs](https://monome.org/docs/modular/ansible).

See the [update procedure](http://monome.org/docs/modular/update).

CAUTION: All presets will be erased.

name: ansible 1.6.1
body:
new features by @AaronMeyers: Ratchet, Alt Note, Glide parameters

see docs: https://monome.org/docs/modular/ansible

thank you to @mtallen for updating the docs!

See http://monome.org/docs/modular/update for update procedure

CAUTION: All presets will be erased.

* fix grid preset refresh with ext clock

body:
* fix USB freeze with external clock input

See http://monome.org/docs/modular/update for update procedure

name: ansible 1.5.0
body:
* **new** (cycles) pulse division setting per ring
* **new** (kria) meta pattern mode
* **new** (kria) cue clock and cued pattern changes
* **fix** (kria) tune probabilities
* **fix** (kria) lengthen hold time for pattern save
* **fix** (mp) inter-row sync now time-aligned

See http://monome.org/docs/modular/update for update procedure!

CAUTION: All presets will be erased.

name: ansible 1.4.1
body:
- fixed low level usb handling (hotplug is reliable now)
- fixed cycles position ii message range
